properties.areaDesc: Putnam, TN; Cumberland, TN; White, TN
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 3 at 1:56AM CST until March 3 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Northwestern Cumberland County in Middle Tennessee...
Northern White County in Middle Tennessee...
Southern Putnam County in Middle Tennessee...

* Until 230 AM CST.

* At 156 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado
was located near Baxter, or near Cookeville, moving east at 45 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* This dangerous storm will be near...
Cookeville around 200 AM CST.
Monterey around 220 AM CST.

Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include
Burgess Falls State Park, Hamptons Crossroads, Bakers Crossroads and
Pleasant Hill.

This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 278 and 310.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 2:30 AM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
